availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John P. Williamson (McCracken County agent for stone cutter)

body.p: Paducah, Kentucky, agent for stone cutter. Pennsylvania native. Agent for stone cutter in Paducah in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, City of Paducah, p. 879.
Find A Grave, John P. Williamson (April 30, 1791-December 16, 1871), Memorial # 28355930, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/28355930 (accessed August 1, 2019).
